Articles.Content:
continuing their crusade of star system plundering, the mighty Kerbal warrior have created the XF/A-115 Rapier-type fighter bomber. Carrying 2 highly innacurate nuclear rockets and 4 lithium-ion batteries explosive bombs, this craft serves as a short-ranged line of defense for terrestrial threats.

1- Fire nuclear rockets

2- Inner bomb pair

3- Outer bomb pair

Protip: For a self-stabilizing missiles that fly straight as an arrow, give each separatron a 5Ã‚Âº tilt sideways so they impart spin, and watch it spin-stabilize itself beautifully without significant range reduction. It's quite tricky to get it right on the SPH beacuse of the symmetry settings, so what I do is building my weapons in the VAB, where I can use radial symmetry, save them as subassemblies (with the aid of the subassembly mod, of course), then install them back in the SPH.

Only problem is gravity- being as everything is a bomb of some sort with jets, spin doesn't actuall do much more than ensure it'll fly in the direction the plane is pointing. But I can add some spin, I guess.
